item.title: OnePlus 13 goes on sale in India: Check price, introductory offers, more - Business Standard
item.description:
OnePlus 13 Now Available in India: Prices and Introductory Offers

Publication Date: January 7, 2023 | Source: Business Standard

The OnePlus 13 has been launched in India, featuring advanced specifications and attractive introductory offers for prospective buyers.

  • The smartphone is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chip.
  • Features a camera system co-created with Hasselblad.
  • Available storage options: 12GB RAM + 256GB, 16GB RAM + 512GB, and 24GB RAM + 1TB.
  • Introductory offers include discounts for ICICI Bank card transactions and exchange bonuses for existing OnePlus users.
  • OnePlus is providing a 180-day replacement plan for early buyers.
“The OnePlus 13 flagship smartphone is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon eight Elite processor, with configurations offering up to 24GB of RAM and 1TB of storage.”

In conclusion, the OnePlus 13 presents premium features and offers, aiming to attract both new and existing customers.

item.title: Best 55 Inch Sony Televisions in India for Massive Entertainment Experience (2025) - The Economic Times
item.description:
Best 55 Inch Sony Televisions in India for Massive Entertainment Experience (2025)

Publication Date: 2025

Source: Economic Times

Television can be an important aspect of your home if you and your family like to spend time watching quality content, movies, series, and other media together. This article curates a list of the best 55 inch Sony televisions available in India, helping buyers find the right model for their homes.

Key Points:

  • Includes a list of top models available on Amazon.
  • Features detailed specifications for each TV.
  • Highlights customer reviews and reasons to buy.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

“We have included all required details to help you find the right one for your home.”

Conclusion: This article serves as a comprehensive guide for anyone looking to purchase the best Sony televisions, showcasing features, prices, and customer feedback.

item.title: DailyObjects launches new Qi2-certified LOOP power banks: Price and details - Business Standard
item.description:
DailyObjects Launches Qi2-Certified LOOP Power Banks

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: DailyObjects

India-based accessory brand DailyObjects has launched its LOOP series of power banks, which are claimed to be the first Qi2-certified power banks in the country.

The LOOP series is designed to support 15W fast wireless charging and is compatible with multiple smartphones and accessories following the Qi2 wireless charging standard. Below are the details regarding the pricing and availability:

  • 5000mAh: Rs 3,999
  • 10,000mAh: Rs 5,999
  • 20,000mAh: Rs 7,499

The LOOP power banks will be available on the DailyObjects website and will soon be listed on major e-commerce platforms like Amazon and Flipkart.

Key Features of the LOOP Power Banks

  • Qi2 certification ensuring compatibility with a range of smartphones including iPhones from the 12 series and select Android devices.
  • Aerospace-grade aluminium chassis with a distinctive loop pattern.
  • Built-in Apple Watch wireless charging modules in the 10,000mAh and 20,000mAh variants.
  • Retractable stand for convenience.

Understanding Qi2

Qi2 is an open wireless charging standard that enhances charging efficiency and safety through magnetic alignment.

“Qi2 provides faster and more efficient wireless charging.”

The launch of the LOOP power banks demonstrates DailyObjects' commitment to innovation in wireless charging solutions.

item.title: Ubisoft’s Assassin’s Creed Shadows release delayed again - The Indian Express
item.description:
Ubisoft Delays Assassin's Creed Shadows Release to March

Date: January 10, 2025 Source: Indian Express

Ubisoft has pushed back the launch of Assassin’s Creed Shadows from February 14 to March 20, aiming to integrate player feedback and enhance the final product.

  • The release was postponed to allow more development time based on player feedback.
  • This marks the second delay for Assassin's Creed Shadows; the original launch was set for November.
  • Ubisoft is facing challenges with other titles, including Star Wars Outlaws, which underperformed.
  • The company plans to make significant cost reductions and has appointed advisers for strategic options.
  • Expected net bookings for Q3 are around 300 million euros, down from earlier forecasts.
“We aim to create the best conditions for launch by closely engaging with the increasingly positive community.” - Ubisoft

This delay reflects Ubisoft's ongoing effort to respond to community feedback while navigating financial challenges and underperformance in other titles.

item.title: Politics News Today Live Updates on January 10, 2025: Arab states race Turkey for influence in new Syria | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Politics News Today Live Updates on January 10, 2025: Canada to get a new Prime Minister on THIS date, Justin Trudeau to continue as PM till then; who are the frontrunners?

Date: 10 Jan, 2025 Source: LiveMint

In a significant political development, Canada is set to elect a new Prime Minister following Justin Trudeau's decision to step down, with Mark Carney and Chrystia Freeland emerging as leading candidates.

  • Canada's Liberal Party will elect a new leader following Justin Trudeau's resignation. Mark Carney and Chrystia Freeland are leading candidates.
“Our goal is to offer a clear perspective on the issues, leaders, and decisions that impact daily life.”

This election marks a pivotal moment for Canadian politics as the nation prepares for a new leadership direction.

item.title: A family's contemporary Bengaluru home is a reflection of their life in Boston - Architectural Digest India
item.description:
A family's contemporary Bengaluru home reflects their life in Boston

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Architectural Digest

This article explores how a family moving to Bengaluru sought to create a home that mirrors their life in Boston, combining local artistry with modern elegance.

  • The clients wanted a home that reflects their Boston lifestyle while rooted in Bengaluru's culture.
  • Designers focused on light, texture, and personal storytelling throughout the space.
  • Features state-of-the-art automation systems for enhanced security and convenience.
  • The home incorporates thoughtful design elements to maximize natural light.
  • The kitchen is designed as the heart of the home for family gatherings.
  • Bedrooms offer a softer color palette for warmth and comfort.
“The transformation — brought to life by light, textures, and materials — elevates the home from a blank canvas to a living, artistic, and deeply personal experience.” - Gaurav Panjwani

This contemporary home serves as a soothing retreat for the family, beautifully integrating their past experiences with their present life in India.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 set to launch on Jan 10: Where to watch, expected specs, more - Business Standard
item.description:
Xiaomi Pad 7 set to launch on January 10: Where to watch, expected specs, more

Last Updated: Jan 10 2025 | Source: Business Standard

Xiaomi is set to launch the Pad 7 tablet in India on January 10, a device featuring advanced display technology and high performance specs.

  • Launch event to start at 12 PM on January 10, livestreamed on Xiaomi India’s YouTube channel.
  • The device features Nano Texture Display technology, reducing glare.
  • Expected specifications include: 11.2-inch LCD, Snapdragon 7 Plus Gen 3, up to 12GB RAM, 13MP rear camera.
  • Battery capacity at 8850mAh with 45W fast charging support.
“The tablet will come with additional accessories like a folio case with a keyboard and stylus pen.”

This new tablet aims to combine advanced performance with user-friendly features and is anticipated to be a strong competitor in the market.

item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes for January 10, 2024

New redeem codes for Garena Free Fire MAX are available today, providing players with opportunities to obtain free weapons, diamonds, and various rewards.

  • Latest redeem codes can be used to win exciting in-game rewards.

Stay tuned for more updates and opportunities to get rewards in Garena Free Fire MAX.

item.title: Oppo launches Reno 13 5G smartphone series in India, prices start from Rs 37,999 - ETTelecom
item.description:
Oppo launches Reno 13 5G smartphone series in India, prices start from Rs 37,999

Date: January 10, 2025 Source: ETTelecom

NEW DELHI: Oppo has launched its new Reno series smartphones, available for purchase starting January 11, 2025, with several attractive offers and features.

  • Reno 13 starts at Rs 37,999 (8GB RAM + 128GB storage).
  • Reno 13 Pro starts at Rs 49,999 (12GB RAM + 256GB storage).
  • Both models support 5G and come with advanced camera systems and GenAI features.
  • Includes a six-month liquid damage protection and Rs 3,000 exchange bonus on purchases from select outlets.
"Both smartphones run on the latest Oppo ColorOS 15 and support 80W fast charging."

This launch signifies Oppo's commitment to enhancing its 5G offerings in India, aiming to cater to tech-savvy consumers looking for advanced mobile features.

item.title: Small investments surge as new wave of angel investors enters startup scene, seeking lucrative returns | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Small investments surge as new wave of angel investors enters startup scene, seeking lucrative returns

Publication Date: Recent
Source: Company Business News

Investments starting from ₹50,000 are witnessing a significant increase in India's startup ecosystem, driven by a new demographic of angel investors eager for profitable opportunities.

  • New-age angel investors are making micro-investments typically starting at ₹50,000.
  • Angel investor cheques predominantly range between ₹3 lakh and ₹8 lakh.
  • This trend indicates a significant shift towards smaller investment amounts as compared to traditional investing patterns.
"The rising incomes and fear of missing out on lucrative deals are key drivers behind this surge in angel investments."

This movement suggests a broader transformation in how investment is approached within India's vibrant startup scene, pointing towards an inclusive financial landscape.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 family might arrive with an unwelcome price hike - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 family might arrive with an unwelcome price hike

Publication Date: [Insert Date Here] | Source: [Insert Source Here]

Samsung is unveiling the Galaxy S25 family on January 22, and ahead of that, the pricing for the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra has seemingly been revealed in Europe. An Italian retailer uploaded its pricing too soon, and while the prices look odd, here’s a breakdown.

  • The S25 is expected to be priced around €949 for 128GB and possibly close to €999 for the base model.
  • The S25+ pricing is rumored to start around €1,246 for 256GB.
  • The S25 Ultra is allegedly priced at €1,571 with 256GB and up to €1,948 for the 1TB version.
Overall, this indicates a potential €100 price hike across all models in Europe.

The Galaxy S25 Slim is not included in this pricing discussion as it is rumored to be released later than the other models.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 family might arrive with an unwelcome price hike - GSMArena.com
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 family might arrive with an unwelcome price hike

Publication Date: January 22

Source: GSMArena

Samsung is set to unveil the Galaxy S25 family on January 22, and pricing details have surfaced from an Italian retailer, suggesting a potential price increase.

  • The S25 is purportedly priced at €973 for 128GB, €1,036 for 256GB, and €1,162 for 512GB.
  • The S25+ may come in at €1,246 for 256GB and €1,371 for 512GB.
  • The S25 Ultra is rumored to be priced at €1,571 for 256GB, €1,696 for 512GB, and €1,948 for 1TB.
“If we round all of these prices up to the nearest hundred euros, then it seems like Europe is in for a €100 price hike across the board.”

This pricing information might simply be speculative and not verified, with the Galaxy S25 Slim expected to release sometime later.

item.title: Politics News Today Live Updates on January 10, 2025: CCPA plans class action against firms selling substandard products | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Politics News Today Live Updates on January 10, 2025: CCPA plans class action against firms selling substandard products

Publication Date: 10 Jan, 2025 | Source: LiveMint

In today’s complex political climate, understanding the latest developments is essential. The CCPA is initiating a class action against consumer durable firms for selling products with substandard parts, particularly in tier-II and tier-III cities.

  • This proposal comes after the Department of Consumer Affairs noted that consumer durable firms are using different, substandard parts for products sold in tier-II and tier-III cities, making them less efficient than those approved during quality test certification by the Bureau of Indian Standards.
“Understanding the latest developments is essential for citizens.”

This initiative aims to ensure consumer protection and uphold product quality standards.

item.title: NHPC eyes PTC buy sans financing arm | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
NHPC Aims to Acquire Stake in PTC India

Publication Date: [Not provided] Source: Live Mint

India’s largest hydropower generator NHPC Ltd is looking to buy out its public sector co-promoters in PTC India Ltd, according to sources familiar with the matter.

  • The Union power ministry is set to meet executives from four public sector undertakings to discuss the PTC India stake sale.
  • This initiative reflects NHPC's strategic interests in expanding its portfolio in the power trading sector.

item.title: CES 2025: The 22 most impressive products you don't want to miss - ZDNet
item.description:
CES 2025: The 22 most impressive products you don't want to miss

Date: January 7, 2025   Source: ZDNET

The annual Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas showcases the most innovative products in technology, from smart glasses with invisible displays to an AI-powered supercomputer. Here are the standout innovations from CES 2025.

  • Smart glasses with invisible display integrated into the frame.
  • TCL's QM6K TV features Mini LED technology at an entry-level price.
  • Ozlo Sleepbuds designed for comfort and noise blocking during sleep.
  • Swippit charges smartphones in under 5 seconds using a battery-swapping hub.
  • AI-integrated TVs from major brands enhancing viewer experience.
  • Roborock's new robot vacuum with a mechanical arm for obstacle removal.
  • Lenovo's rollable laptop offering expandable display capabilities.
  • Samsung's stretchable screens promising future tech applications.
  • Nuance Audio hearing glasses with built-in microphone and speakers.
  • Nvidia's Project Digits: a powerful Linux-based AI desktop supercomputer.

CES is a platform for groundbreaking technological advancements, showcasing products that redefine their categories and enhance user experience.

item.title: CES 2025: Best Product Overall, Plus 28 More Must-See Gadgets (and Counting) - CNET
item.description:
CES 2025: Best Product Overall, Plus 28 More Must-See Gadgets (and Counting)

Publication Date: January 8, 2025 | Source: CNET

CES 2025 has kicked off in Las Vegas with an array of innovative technologies. CNET has awarded the Nvidia Cosmos AI model as the Best Overall winner, highlighting its potential to revolutionize multiple sectors.

  • Nvidia Cosmos awarded Best Overall for its scope in AI development.
  • Honda introduced prototypes of its electric vehicles due for production in 2026.
  • LG unveiled the AeroCatTower, an air-purifying cat perch.
  • The TCL Ai Mi, a connected robot companion for kids, is showcased.
  • New smart kitchen appliances, including a microwave with integrated cooking videos, are presented.
  • Solar-powered technologies aiming to simplify energy use have gained attention.
“Nvidia has the power to transform society with Cosmos...” - Imad Khan, CNET

CES 2025 showcases cutting-edge technology with lasting implications across industries, enhancing both daily life and future endeavors.
